author: Rachel Cave
title: N.B. scientist helped to grow COVID-19 from Canada's first patient
description: It's hard to imagine, in the context of COVID-19, what it could mean to be in the right place, at the right time.
content:
It's hard to imagine, in the context of COVID-19, what it could mean to be in the right place at the right time.
But you could say it happened to Dr. Samira Mubareka.
On Jan. 23, Canada's first COVID-19 patient was admitted to Sunnybrook Hospital, where Mub… [+2121 chars]
